document_data.mainbody:
darbrent Villa was the family estate of the Waterdhavian noble house Adarbrent.
The Adarbrent Villa was located on the corner of the Manycats Alley and Shield Street, in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
This building complex consisted of two high quality buildings, one that was four stories tall and another that stood three stories tall.Evidence of this information can be seen in how the villa is depicted on maps.
